alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 11:11PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Greeley, Valley, Sherman and northwestern Howard Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Hartsuff State Park to Comstock to near Berwyn to near Oconto. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elyria and Fort Hartsuff State Park around 1130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ord and Arcadia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
